value: Privacy Policy - Find The Differences Mobile App For Android

Here at "Pattarachanok Klinjan Apps" we want to make content safe for use by people of all ages, especially young children. To the best of our knowledge, the following statements are true for all of our products across all platforms:
We collect no personal information through our apps and games.
Again, we collect no personal information, but in accordance with COPPA, we want you to know your parental rights:
We wonât require a child to disclose more information than is reasonably necessary to participate in an activity.
You can review your childâs personal information, direct you to delete it, and refuse to allow any further collection or use of the childâs information.
You can agree to the collection and use of your childâs information, but still not allow disclosure to third parties unless thatâs part of the service .
Feel free to contact us if you have any further questions or concerns.

We may feature advertising within our Services. The advertisers may collect and use information about you, such as your session activity, device identifier, MAC address, IMEI, geo-location information and IP address. They may use this information to provide advertisements of interest to you. By using the Services you agree that such third party advertisers may collect and use data and information in accordance with privacy policy of the company providing the ad serving technology. A link of the relevant privacy policies from ad serving companies that operate their own networks on our Services is set forth below. "Pattarachanok Klinjan Apps" is not responsible for the information practices of advertisers and partners. The collection, use, and disclosure of information by advertisers and partners are subject to their respective privacy policies, which may differ from this Privacy Policy.

Playing our games socially
Interaction with third party social networks or platforms
You may allow our Services to interact with a third party social network or platform, which will provide information about you to us. These applications or websites are created and maintained by a third party which is not a part of, or controlled by "Pattarachanok Klinjan Apps". You should ensure that you read their terms of service and privacy policies to understand how they treat your data and what data they might share with us.

You understand that where you allow our Services to interact with any third party social network or platform, we may share data about you with your contacts (and vice versa) in order that you may enjoy playing socially (the âSocial Dataâ). This Social Data includes your name, your social media profile picture and your scores and/or progress in our games.

You can make changes to what data a third party social network or platform shares with us, or stop our Services interacting with that social network or platform by adjusting your settings with that third party provider, however you may find you are not able to enjoy all of the same features of our Services.

Notification of Changes
"Pattarachanok Klinjan Apps"Â may edit this policy from time to time. If we make any substantial changes, we will prominently post a notice on this page to alert you of the change. You are advised to consult this Privacy Policy regularly for any changes.
Your Consent: By using our site or applications, you consent to our online privacy policy.

Contacting Us
If there are any questions regarding this privacy policy you may contact us using the information below.
